constituent: genesis, godown, meeting, single gate, umbrella, stable door, mouth, sword, sabre, saber
koohiiStory1: Back in the day the people were so excited to get hold of the Sega genesis they looted the godown with sabers.
koohiiStory2: I prefer to have girls Godown on my sabre to prevent unwanted GENESIS of babies............創造　そうぞう (creation).
kunYomi: つく.る、はじ.める、きず、けず.しける
words:
創刊(そうかん): launching (e.g. newspaper), first issue
創作(そうさく): production, literary creation, work
創造(そうぞう): creation
創立(そうりつ): establishment, founding, organization
独創(どくそう): originality
